block states.item: STRING: the item to be dropped, in nbt format
block states.block: STRING: the block name of the spawned block if this block is destroyed, default = minecraft:air
block states.block_state: STRING: the block states of the spawned block if this block is destroyed, default = default
block states.chance: FLOAT: the chance the item drops

conditions.minecraft:drops: INTEGER: amount of drops already dropped, before this item spawns

minecraft:drops.min: INTEGER: minimum amount of drops already dropped, before this item spawns
minecraft:drops.max: INTEGER: maximum amount of drops already dropped, before this item spawns

conditions.minecraft:tool: STRING: the tool required to obtain this drop in nbt format
minecraft:tool: STRING: one of the tools required to obtain this drop in nbt format
conditions.minecraft:block: STRING: the block name that replaces this block
minecraft:block: STRING: one of the block names that replaces this block
conditions.minecraft:entity: STRING: the entity that is required to destroy the block for this drop to spawn, in nbt format
minecraft:entity: STRING: one of the entities that is required to destroy the block for this drop to spawn, in nbt format
conditions.inverse: BOOLEAN: if it should be anything BUT the stated tool/block/entity (does not invert drops condition)
conditions.minecraft:nbt: STRING: NBT of the block entity required to match

count.min: INTEGER: minimum number required for a random count valuE
count.max: INTEGER: maximum number required for a random count value

functions.copy: STRING: What tags to copy to the resulting item, empty means all tags
functions.paste: STRING: Where to paste the tags, empty for same path as copy, note: this does NOT default to tag:{BlockEntityTag:{}} but tag:{}

functions.drop: BOOLEAN: if the Items tag and similar should drop all items upon removal of this block
